heroSubtitle: A global community connecting travelers, locals, and seasonal employers through honest stays, fair work, and shared trust.
staysSubtitle: Furnished & unfurnished short-term rentals with a simple private agreement.
jobsSubtitle: Hospitality, mountain ops, retail & trades. Hire fast, work the season.
hpStorySnippet: When we were struggling to find a home, an Austrian family said, 'we want to help you out.' That kindness is our blueprint.
hpAgreementTeaserTitle: The Smart Stay Agreement ‚Äî built for trust
hpAgreementTeaserBody: Plain-language, dual-language friendly, and adaptable across countries. Start every stay with shared clarity.
aboutText1: Seasoners helps travelers and hosts connect for short-term stays and seasonal work.
aboutText2: We keep agreements simple and direct ‚Äî helping you live and work around the world.
aboutDisclaimer: Nothing on this website is legal advice. Always review agreements under local law.
aboutMission: Seasoners exists to restore human trust in how people move, live, and work across seasons.
founderQuote: you guys remind us of our own sons, and we want to help you out.
founderQuoteAttribution: An Austrian family ‚Äì the moment Seasoners began
aboutHumanConnection: That kindness showed us what global housing and seasonal work have lost: empathy and personal trust.
aboutWhyItMatters: Platforms became transactional. We are rebuilding a human bridge between travelers, locals, and seasonal employers.
pillarConnectionBody: Every stay and job should feel like a relationship, not a reservation ID.
pillarFairnessBody: Plain-language agreements, clear expectations, and mutual respect over hidden rules.
pillarCultureBody: We help people cross social and language gaps with context, care, and curiosity.
aboutInvitation: Share your season story. Help someone feel at home faster than an algorithm ever could.
subscribeSubtitle: Unlock full access to Seasoners. Contact sellers, create listings, and grow your seasonal network.
trialInfo: All plans include a 7-day free trial. Cancel anytime, no questions asked.

agreementTemplateEn: Rental Agreement between [Tenant] and [Landlord] for [Address] from [Start] to [End]. Monthly rent ‚Ç¨[Amount].
agreementTemplateDe: Mietvertrag zwischen [Mieter] und [Vermieter] f√ºr [Adresse] vom [Start] bis [Ende]. Monatliche Miete ‚Ç¨[Betrag].
agreementDisclaimer: Template only ‚Äî not legal advice. Review locally before signing.
agreementPreambleEn: This agreement is designed to help travelers and hosts build trust from day one. It‚Äôs written in plain language so both parties know what‚Äôs expected ‚Äî and what‚Äôs fair. By signing, both sides commit to clear communication, honesty, and respect throughout the stay.
agreementPreambleDe: Diese Vereinbarung soll Reisenden und Gastgebern helfen, von Anfang an Vertrauen aufzubauen. Sie ist in klarer Sprache verfasst, damit beide Seiten wissen, was erwartet wird ‚Äî und was fair ist. Mit der Unterschrift verpflichten sich beide zu klarer Kommunikation, Ehrlichkeit und Respekt w√§hrend des Aufenthalts.
clauseBasicsEn: Address, dates, rent amount, included utilities, and any furnishings. Both parties confirm the space is suitable and respectfully maintained.
clauseBasicsDe: Adresse, Zeitr√§ume, Mietbetrag, enthaltene Nebenkosten und ggf. M√∂blierung. Beide Parteien best√§tigen, dass die Unterkunft geeignet ist und respektvoll gepflegt wird.
clauseCultureEn: Both parties agree to approach cultural differences with understanding and open communication. If something feels unclear or unusual, we talk first.
clauseCultureDe: Beide Parteien gehen mit kulturellen Unterschieden verst√§ndnisvoll und offen um. Wenn etwas unklar oder ungewohnt ist, sprechen wir zuerst miteinander.
clauseMutualExitEn: If circumstances change, either party may end the stay early with respectful notice. Standard notice: [NoticeDays] days (or as required locally). Any prepaid amounts are reconciled fairly.
clauseMutualExitDe: Wenn sich Umst√§nde √§ndern, kann jede Partei den Aufenthalt mit respektvoller K√ºndigungsfrist beenden. Standardfrist: [NoticeDays] Tage (oder gem√§√ü lokalen Vorgaben). Vorauszahlungen werden fair abgerechnet.
clausePaymentsEn: Rent due on [DueDay] each month via [Method]. Deposits, if any, are held for damages beyond normal wear. Provide receipts and return timely after checkout.
clausePaymentsDe: Miete f√§llig am [DueDay] jedes Monats per [Methode]. Kautionen, falls vorhanden, werden f√ºr Sch√§den √ºber normale Abnutzung hinaus verwendet. Quittungen bereitstellen und nach Auszug zeitnah zur√ºckzahlen.
clauseHouseRulesEn: Quiet hours, shared areas, guests, smoking, pets, and local registration if needed. Rules are reasonable, clear, and communicated before signing.
clauseHouseRulesDe: Ruhezeiten, Gemeinschaftsbereiche, G√§ste, Rauchen, Haustiere und ggf. lokale Anmeldung. Regeln sind zumutbar, klar und vor der Unterschrift mitgeteilt.
clauseDisputesEn: We resolve issues in good faith. Start with a conversation, then written notice. If needed, seek local mediation resources before legal steps.
clauseDisputesDe: Konflikte l√∂sen wir nach bestem Wissen und Gewissen. Zun√§chst Gespr√§ch, dann schriftliche Mitteilung. Falls n√∂tig, lokale Vermittlungsstellen vor rechtlichen Schritten nutzen.
countryNotesEn: Deposit limits, notice periods, and registration rules differ by country and city. Before signing, check local requirements and update placeholders like [NoticeDays], [DueDay], and [Method].
countryNotesDe: Kautionsh√∂hen, K√ºndigungsfristen und Meldepflichten unterscheiden sich je nach Land und Stadt. Vor der Unterschrift lokale Anforderungen pr√ºfen und Platzhalter wie [NoticeDays], [DueDay] und [Method] anpassen.
